rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {3900, 4525, M5013}
Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {PSY4051, PSY4131}

description: This unit covers all important aspects of abnormal behaviour: historical influences, theory, assessment, specific psychopathologies, treatment methods, and legal issues. Both the scientific and professional aspects of abnormal psychology are presented. Students will be provided with a broad and comprehensive review of abnormal behaviour, by studying and contrasting different theoretical perspectives.
faculty: Faculty of Medicine, Nursing and Health Sciences
